attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence to buy something without receiving a receipt thus spreading the tax burden wider
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The black economy results in a higher tax burden for those who declare their income.

Compelling traders to issue receipts for every sale will result in higher returns for the exchequer.

Tax payers concerned about inequalities in the tax system can then do their bit towards creating a more equitable distribution of taxes.
